section.title: 存储程序
section.para: 存储过程没有返回数据，需使用call proc()调用

section.title: EXECUTE 执行 SQL
section.para: 在过程中运行SQL，下面的例子是文件导出的例子。

section.title: PREPARE 传递参数
section.programlisting:
mysql> PREPARE stmt1 FROM 'SELECT SQRT(POW(?,2) + POW(?,2)) AS hypotenuse'; Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec) Statement prepared
mysql> SET @a = 3; Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)
mysql> SET @b = 4; Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)
mysql> EXECUTE stmt1 USING @a, @b; +------------+ | hypotenuse | +------------+ | 5 | +------------+ 1 row in set (0.00 sec)
mysql> DEALLOCATE PREPARE stmt1; Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)
mysql>

section.para: 函数会返回数据，调用函数使用 select fun(),不能使用call调用，否则提示
section.screen: mysql> call myfun(); ERROR 1305 (42000): PROCEDURE test.myfun does not exist
section.programlisting:
CREATE TABLE `t` ( `id` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `n` INT(11) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5;
CREATE DEFINER=`neo`@`%` FUNCTION `myfun`() RETURNS int(11) LANGUAGE SQL NOT DETERMINISTIC READS SQL DATA SQL SECURITY DEFINER COMMENT '' BEGIN INSERT INTO t (n) VALUES(rand()*100); RETURN LAST_INSERT_ID(); END
section.screen: mysql> select myfun(); +---------+ | myfun() | +---------+ | 9 | +---------+ 1 row in set, 2 warnings (0.07 sec)
